TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed FileIOPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class FileIOPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class FileIOPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限区分以下四种类型提供的文件 IO 访问:This permission distinguishes between the following four types of file IO access provided by : - `Read`： 对文件或访问该文件，例如，其长度或上次修改时间有关的信息的内容的读取访问。`Read`: Read access to the contents of the file or access to information about the file, such as its length or last modification time. - `Write`： 对文件或更改文件，例如其名称的信息的访问权限的内容的写入访问。`Write`: Write access to the contents of the file or access to change information about the file, such as its name. 此外可以删除并覆盖。Also allows for deletion and overwriting. - `Append`： 用于编写到文件末尾的功能。`Append`: Ability to write to the end of a file only. 不是能读取。No ability to read. - `PathDiscovery`： 访问权限的路径本身中的信息。`PathDiscovery`: Access to the information in the path itself. 这可帮助保护敏感信息在路径中，例如，用户名称，以及有关路径中显示的目录结构的信息。This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure that is revealed in the path. 此值不授予对路径所指代的文件或文件夹的访问权限。This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path. > [!NOTE] > 提供访问程序集是类似于其授予完全信任。Giving access to an assembly is similar to granting it full trust. 如果应用程序不应写入文件系统，它不应具有访问。If an application should not write to the file system, it should not have access. 所有这些权限是独立的这意味着对一个权限并不表示对另一个权限。All these permissions are independent, meaning that rights to one do not imply rights to another. 例如，`Write`权限并不意味着权限`Read`或`Append`。For example, `Write` permission does not imply permission to `Read` or `Append`. 如果需要多个权限，则它们可以组合使用按位 OR，如下面的代码示例中所示。If more than one permission is desired, they can be combined using a bitwise OR as shown in the code example that follows. 根据规范的绝对路径; 定义文件权限始终应使用规范的文件路径进行调用。File permission is defined in terms of canonical absolute paths; calls should always be made with canonical file paths. 描述文件和文件夹上的受保护的操作。 describes protected operations on files and folders. 类可帮助提供对文件和文件夹的安全访问。The class helps provide secure access to files and folders. 创建文件的句柄时执行的安全访问检查。The security access check is performed when the handle to the file is created. 通过执行操作在创建时进行检查，安全检查的性能影响降至最低。By doing the check at creation time, the performance impact of the security check is minimized. 打开的文件发生一次，而读取和写入可发生多次。Opening a file happens once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times. 打开文件时，没有任何进一步执行检查。Once the file is opened, no further checks are done. 如果该对象传递给不受信任的调用方，它可能被误用。If the object is passed to an untrusted caller, it can be misused. 例如，文件句柄应不存储在具有较少权限的代码可以访问它们的公共全局静态对象。For example, file handles should not be stored in public global statics where code with less permission can access them. 指定可以对文件或文件夹执行的操作。 specifies actions that can be performed on the file or folder. 此外，可以使用按位 OR 成复杂实例组合这些操作。In addition, these actions can be combined using a bitwise OR to form complex instances. 文件夹的访问权限意味着可以对它包含，以及访问所有文件和文件夹及其子文件夹中的所有文件的访问。Access to a folder implies access to all the files it contains, as well as access to all the files and folders in its subfolders. 例如， `Read` C:\folder1\ 访问暗示`Read`权 C:\folder1\file1.txt，C:\folder1\folder2\\，C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt，依次类推。For example, `Read` access to C:\folder1\ implies `Read` access to C:\folder1\file1.txt, C:\folder1\folder2\\, C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，你可以使用方法，以防止对系统资源的受信任的代码的意外访问。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并对资源的访问现在只能由程序集的授予权限来决定。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并将其分配仅对允许代码访问的资源的权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用代码。The following examples illustrate code that uses . 在以下两行代码，该对象后`f`表示读取计算机的本地磁盘的客户端上的所有文件的权限。After the following two lines of code, the object `f` represents permission to read all files on the client computer's local disks. 下面的代码示例然后要求的权限来确定应用程序是否有权读取的文件。The code example then demands the permission to determine whether the application has permission to read the files. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在以下两行代码，该对象后`f2`表示读取 C:\test_r 和读取和写入 C:\example\out.txt 的权限。After the following two lines of code, the object `f2` represents permissions to read C:\test_r and read and write to C:\example\out.txt. `Read` 和`Write`表示如上文所述的文件/文件夹权限。`Read` and `Write` represent the file/folder permissions as previously described. 在创建后的权限，代码调用方请求权限来确定应用程序是否有权读取和写入文件。After creating the permission, the code demands the permission to determine whether the application has the right to read and write to the file. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用对指定文件或目录的指定访问权限以及对文件控制信息的指定访问权限，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the designated file or directory and the specified access rights to file control information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只允许一个要为指定的文件或目录指定值。This constructor allows only one value to be specified for the specified file or directories. 使用方法用来定义复杂的权限。Use the method to define complex permissions. `control`参数指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 文件或指定的目录是否从而`path`可以更改、 查看或无法访问。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the file or directory specified by `path` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 访问控制列表 (ACL) 描述个人或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件和其属性上的特定操作的权限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 能够更改或查看 ACL 是重要的权限，并应多加小心授予。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.

value.span: 所有文件的文件 I/O 标志集合。

span.span: The set of file I/O flags for all files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置对在本地计算机和网络驱动器上的所有文件的允许访问权限。This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives. 个人在检查值是否为使用按位与运算。An individual value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用属性。The following code example shows the use of the property. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles
Public Property AllLocalFiles As FileIOPermissionAccess

public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有本地文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.

value.span: 所有本地文件的文件 I/O 标志集合。

span.span: The set of file I/O flags for all local files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地文件是包含在本地计算机上的文件。Local files are files contained on the local computer. 通过网络驱动器不访问任何文件是本地文件。Any files not accessed through a network drive are local files. 个人在检查值是否为使用按位与运算。An individual value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用属性。The following code example shows the use of the property. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的权限的两个实例的哈希代码可能会有所不同，因此不应使用的哈希代码来比较两个对象。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.

param.name: access
param.span: 表示单一类型的文件访问的 值。

span.span: One of the values that represents a single type of file access.

summary.span: 获取具有指定 的所有文件和目录。

span.span: Gets all files and directories with the specified .

returns.span: 一个包含文件和目录的路径的数组，用户被授予对这些文件和目录 参数所指定的访问权限。

span.span: An array containing the paths of the files and directories to which access specified by the parameter is granted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以获取当前权限的状态。Use this method to get the state of the current permission. 若要获取的两状态`Read`和`Write`访问，两次调用此方法所需。To get the state of both `Read` and `Write` access, two calls to this method are required. > [!NOTE] > `access`参数最多的值为，分别表示一种类型的文件访问。The `access` parameter is limited to the values of , which represent single types of file access. 这些值为， ， ，和。Those values are , , , and . 可接受值`access`不包括和，这不表示一种类型的文件访问。The values acceptable to `access` do not include and , which do not represent single types of file access. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: is , which represents more than one type of file access, or , which does not represent any type of file access.

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 参数不是 ，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组包含通过指定权限的操作，当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 读取访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示读取访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents read access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents read access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: 参数不是 ，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.

[!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/CPP/remarks.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/CS/remarks.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/VB/remarks.vb#12)] 由于访问类型不相同，则不会通过以下代码覆盖此访问权限。This access will not be overwritten by the following code because the access types are not the same. param.name: other
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是由当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
